 • "bank x c / c" in debit VEN "holder c / withholdings suffered" in debit VFA and "bank interest receivable" in credit VFP
 • "bank x current account" in credit VFP "holder with deductions suffered" in credit VFP and "bank interest income" in debit VFA
options: b)  "bank x c / c" and "holder c / withholdings suffered" in vfa debit and "bank interest income" in vep credit
